labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.client_settings: Not sure the number, but Desktop PTB August 11, 2017 (First update with video chat for me)
data.expected_result: The incorrect monitor will be shared, but the cursor will be from the correct one, with my two monitor setup the previews are swapped but say if I select monitor 1, it shows the screen from monitor 2 but my cursor if it's on monitor 1.
data.short_description: Screen sharing uses wrong monitor on a multi monitor setup
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a DM with someone - Start video - Try to start screen sharing - Select a monitor
